lead_paragraph: The militant group has threatened the lives of 11 imams and scholars in the West, in a fight carried out at mosques and Islamic conferences, and on social media.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Leaders in the West Wage a Battle of Theology With ISIS, Stoking Its Anger
headline.main: Muslim Leaders Wage Theological Battle, Stoking ISIS’ Anger

snippet: The militant group has threatened the lives of 11 imams and scholars in the West, in a fight carried out at mosques and Islamic conferences, and on social media.
abstract: Islamic State releases list of 11 Western imams and scholars accusing them of being apostates and threatening them with death; experts say rise of largely unheralded effort to discredit militant group through theological study, taking place in mosques and on social media across United States, is especially effective means of fighting extremism.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
